text:
Hi Abha,
Yaar tere saat kaam karna kafi wholesome and accha experience tha.
Thanks for reminding me and calling me before almost every meeting. 
Initially, I was so scared if I fit in with all these chaapu people in acads team; I'm glad you were there. Hum dono ka team work toh sahi raha, GH acads team !. Also, how can I forget - logonke birthdays pe CS office sajane keliye hum dono toh super excited rehte the XD. 
HUL ke intern rejection ke dukh meh night walk pe bhi gaye the, ab funny lagraha heh. There have been many ups and downs, and we will reach where we deserve sooner or later!. Chaapu toh tum ho hi.
I wish you all the happiness and take care <3
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Onbin,
  Yaar hum first year se jaante heh and kitne saare funny incidents heh humare. I'm sorry for not checking your treasure hunt request mail till second year XD. Our first interaction was that random DE dance compliment during mid sem and after that, we tried to solve a MTH102 problem the next day ( jo hua nahi tha humse :p). Uske baad toh bas TA202 and all the CHE classes. Pata hi nahi chala kab hum general friends se Super sober brozz to gold, silver, bronze bros to super attractive brozz bangaye. Thanks to you guys, I learnt some weird words Yonsh, smoll, nach-nandini and aarti wali birthday celebration. I miss all 4 of us going on treats and sitting together in classes. I guess I wouldn't have survived midsem/endsem night outs in the library or NCL without having some fun time with you and Nandini. Ohh! also you are my ISPP, but unfortunately, woh sem kabhi aaya hi nahi :'(.   Sound wave wala action kaise bhool sakte, yeh toh bas humhe hi pata chalta tha pure class meh. Also those Bhojpuri song suggestions XD.
   I had a perfect time in CHE because of you guys. Not just in courses but in general, I learnt to have fun in the simplest stuff possible. You are my silver brozz forever! (of course I'm gold and Nandini ko bronze banadenge :p) Aaj Kal toh hum teeno ke old photos meh bhi mujhe aise lagraha jaise meh third weeling karrahi lol.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Ankit,
I clearly remember that Dakshana wala incident and I was questioning myself " Am I really that scary? why are these guys getting scared ?" But now I find it really funny. Yes! humhare late night discussions were amazing, kabhi kabhi kafi serious discussions bhi hue the like future goals, all the India conservative mindset and stuff.  But overall, it was nice knowing a different Ankit than that silent, studious Ankit from Dakshana. Also, Thanks for attending all of my midnight birthday celebrations ;p. Dakshana treats ke alava hum inspire session meh bhi saatme gaye the vaise.  Todi aur frequent pizza party karni chahiye thi humhe
We will remain connected, kya pata dakshana valley hi chale jaye dakshana convocation day pe :p. All the very best and good things take time, keep working you'll reach soon :)
author: Yashika

text:
Heyyyyy,
I have a lot of good memories with you. Art class ke baad ka walks up to GH1, Charlie movie ( thanks for translating some parts ), your late-night dance moves and interesting chocolate brownie at CS office; I'll cherish it all. Though we both don't text that often, I hope we will be in touch. Take care <3
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Arzoo,
I remember my first impression of you. 'That girl with a high pony seems cool'. I completely agree that you are sassy, classy with a touch of badassy XD.  Before CS, I guess we had a few hi-hellos here and there. I'm glad it was you, Priyal and Abha - I had a perfect time with you guys <3. Horror movies at CS office and how Priyal was scared by your reflection after the lights out movie - were some of those memories that are just imprinted on my mind.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Handsome,
You have my card and my heart XD.
author: Yashika

text:
Yo Parag!!
Yaar mujhe DE wale dance se yaad ho tum :p, uske baad hall 3 TV Room ka ajeeb dance practise XD. Uss time hum kisiko dekh ke darr gaye the as if we saw some ghost ( I hope you remember this incident ). I  do remember deleting some of your fb posts and comments XD. Antaragni dance practice meh kafi maze kiye humne.  Dance club toh meh bhi kam hi gayi hoon after second year, abhi hopefully kabhi milna hoga. 
Take care and lots of love!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Priyal,
I'm glad it was you, Arzoo and Abha - I had a perfect time with you guys <3.  I enjoyed randomly dancing with you during Orientation'19. I remember a heated up discussion at the end of our tenure, and I hope that's all settled by now. I always wonder how you could come up with games that I never heard of  XD
Take care, all the best!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Atharv,
Thanks to CS, iske pehle sahi meh ni pata tha ki tu exist bhi karta heh.
Even I wonder how did I not know you until then, because out of all the people I have met in my last 4 years, I admire you the most!.  
I remember CTM selection process and a heated up discussion where I was very rigid on my point and felt terrible for repeatedly presenting the same issue.  You might not remember, but you told me, "it's okay to deliver our point if you think it's right." This statement helped me a lot that day. Thank you so much <3. I wish to stay in touch too. Take care! 

Hyderabadi veg biryani (if that exists ) bhejne ka toh koi scene nahi heh, Hyderabad milne aajana kabhi, tab zaroor chalenge!. 
Also, in my opinion, you are the hottest guy in Y17 :p.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi my online friend,
Even I remember that 2nd-year orientation thing. Uske baad we had small hi-hellos once or twice. Yes! Thanks to Instagram (particularly status), where we had good conversations, though we didn't know the exact incident initially, I could resonate with whatever you said.
   I remember hum ek baar library meh mile the, and we both were confused ki Hi bolna heh ya nahi XD. I hope agar kabhi ageh mile toh aisa na ho :p.
  I guess I have told this before, but just to remind you, Your smile is infectious.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Chitranshi!
I always saw you as a fun-loving person and Manisha ki birthday treat meh we had really good time. Thanks to all the CHM wale courses ke reviews, bohot kaam aaye heh XD. 
Stay Happy!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi!
About that train incident, I'm sure you would have helped me too if I was in your position XD. But see, because of that, we have a memory other than placing chibird cards on the cycles during Midsem.

All the very best for your future :)
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Esha,
You are the perfect roommate. I have been in the hostel from my 9th standard, and you are the best roommate I have ever made. I am so sorry for the alarm sound ( scooby doo pa pa.. even I hate it now). My first impression of you was she would be super smart, cute and very cheerful, which you really are. I wish we could get one more EDM night to go dance like crazy. Thanks for being there when I was feeling emotionally low in my second year :). I loved when aunty brought those different eatables which she prepared in our room. Please send me the recipe, that flavour is still in memory. Other than studious Esha, which most of the others know, I am glad I got to know Esha, who loves dancing during EDMs and treats, does Zumba, chit-chats, gossips, and is very fun-loving. Of course, never start a year watching Vivah; we know it's going to be a disaster. 

  We will be in touch, love you a lot and all the very best <3
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Inshu,
I still remember that orientation "Jab we met" wala photoshoot and you telling me that I look like one of your school best friend <3. After that, we didn't really have other things or clubs in common, but you were always on my list of friends. You are the sweetest! All the best, and let's hope we get to meet again. Take care.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Jaspreet,
I'm glad you dropped a memoir. I'm so happy to know that someone finds me more or less like them :). I wish you all the happiness and best wishes for your future.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi bro,
Kafi hardworking insaan ho tum, itna ki bas ek hi cheez pe focus karoge chahe duniya meh baki sab ulta kyu na hojaye. I wish you all the best and take care <3
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Fellow South Indian,
Yes! Orientation meh even I was finding south Indian people to feel like home :). All the mess table random discussion and Galaxy meetings were fun. Itni loud voice and energy kaha se aati heh XD
author: Yashika

text:
Hi  Kiran,
First year meh toh kafi kam baat hui thi but thanks to Manisha! Tumhare room meh kafi aana hua second year meh, har baar toh manisha tumhare room meh hi milti thi XD. Thanks for supporting me in second year when I was feeling emotionally low. I am very grateful to you for letting me be your roomie for a week during mid sem break so that I don't feel lonely. Kafi treats pe gaye heh saatme, and it was really fun. 
I wish you are all the happiness! Take care <3
author: Yashika

text: How are you so caring and sweet?
author: Yashika

text:
Tkkrh,
This is memoir part 2, first is the card.
Please keep sending me wholesome comics. I love them. Thanks for listening to me whenever I needed to share something. You have been my go-to person for the last one year or so.  Feeling happy, sad, excited about something, frustrated, want to vent out, angry or bored - Just text Deepak!. Also, thanks for the Netflix account and midnight gossip sessions. Antaragni ke time pe tere tinder account chalane meh bada maza aaya tha (my first time using tinder :p). Thanks for ameeronka chocolate XD. 
Feel good about yourself, you are unique, and you got a lot of friends.
Tere calls kabhi ignore ni karoongi, not even drunk calls. I'll be there for you always :)
Love ya... Take care. Milke pending parties zaroor karenge.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Presi,
Thank you so much for being there; my HEC moments wouldn't be that great without you. With all the extravagent ideas, Diwali pe lantern bhi layenge, Independence day pe balloons se sajayenge, galaxy keliye dance room hi banadenge.. all these would be possible without you having my back and trusting ki hum karlenge saatme. Vaise isse pehle humne takneek meh robotics event meh bhi participate kiya tha :p. Of course Nandini ko chidana is whole different mood. Also, that video story that you confirmed with all its detailing XD (HEC things, you know what it is ).
Thanks for all the help during the interview preparations. We will stay connected. Take care and all the best for the future!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Manisha madam,
  It's already 5 years!. I never thought we would grow this close when we were in Dakshana. Maybe the best is yet to come, but I have seen you grow a lot in these 5 years, and I'm super proud of you!. 
I still have that card which you just dropped in my room and went missing for hours. That card literally gave me and Priyakhee a low-level heart attack. Itna senti card kon likta heh!, we literally thought it was a suicide note XD. You made my IITK journey special with all those endless conversations about friends, crush, fashion, skincare, and many secrets :p. You are that BFF who sweeps out all the toxic people from my life (All the second year incidents) and that friend who is single till now ( so bois your chance is still there XD) but has advices to all my relationship issues. You already got your Harry potter cake, so you know what to do!.  Aur kitna hi likhoon yaar, goodbye note hojayega varna. Tujse toh milne hi wali hoon and firse apne saare naye stories detail meh bataoongi XD.
   Thanks for constantly supporting me and for your delicious kettle wali maggie. I'm just one call away!. Three is never a crowd, but always a squad ( Yashika, Pooja, Manisha at Dakshana. Yashika, Priyakhee, Manisha at IITK)

Love you a lot <3
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Bhavita,
We have come a long way, vaise first year se pata toh chalgaya tha ki ab forth year tak toh yeh pakka dost rahegi meri. Even though we were busy with our stuff, I'm amazed how we could connnect so well whenever we spoke. I loved gossiping with you :p, taking out frustrations of batchmates, family friends, literally everyone. Every tiny moment made it special, be it watching "The bold type", numerical method assignments, birthday treats, first-year EDM, self-obsessed, that cute little hard copy of our photo. You have worked hard to be who you are, don't let others bring you down by their words. I am super proud of you and I'll be there for you always :). Love you a lot!!! and all the best.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Neelesh,
Hall 3 TV room wala dance practice was such a pain, sahi meh kafi drama XD.
Anyway, all the best for the future :)
cheers!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi  Neha,
First sem was fun with you and Palak. I love our IITK family, itne unique log jo the. First outing to z square and the mandatory IITK entrance pic bhi.  Teasing you was always fun, and yes I'll never forget that night jis din tu bas english meh bolrahi thi voh bhi itne class and atittude ke saat. We need more of that Neha XD.  Modern Art assignment with Nandini being the ghost was memorable.
  I wish you all the best! Hope karte heh ki kabhi milna hoga. Take care <3
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Nikita,
Yes, last ek month meh hi baat hui heh humahri, mainly Bhavita ki vajah se. It was nice knowing you, even if it was for a short duration.
Take care and all the best!
author: Yashika

text:
"Broooo,
I miss you and chicken tikka masala." - Next time se yeh text kabhi galat time pe ni bhejungi XD. Kafi kuch toh maine card meh hi likdiyatha but yes! Thank you so much for my last day on campus. It's one of my most memorable days. 
You are a trustworthy friend jisko maine kafi kuch bataya hua heh, also I loved listening to your stories in detail :p. Rich prom toh kafi door ki baat heh, kabhi kabhi kudse text ya call karliya karo. Keep me updated with new achievements to add to your intro, which I have recited from the second year XD.  How can I not mention the call on your birthday! "Brooo, Aaj mera birthday heh, tu bhool gayi?" "Yashika, tujhe kya hi pata heh mere bare meh?" After all these, I seriously don't even need a reminder to remember that date.

Mujhe bhi bharosa heh, ki aage bhi logonko jealous karte rahenge XD.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Bro,
I had a great time in my first Sem because of you and Neha. I loved my IITK wali family thing. I admire your flexible personality, energy to try everything, and you mingle with everyone. Even though our interest and friend circle was so different, I'm glad we could bond well. Even I remember the first time we went to Z square and also that mandatory IITK entrance photo.  Thanks for all your bits of advice during winter in my first year. Yaar humne toh DE bhi kiya heh saatme, but treat wale random dance are definitely more fun. While writing this memoir, I remembered the last meeting we had at the campus, in front of GH mess. Let's hope to meet again! All the very best <3.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Pooja,
IITK wali behen <3.  You have the calmest person I have ever known. Batien toh kafi kam hi hui heh, but every time it was nice being around you. Other than family meets, CCD meh tumhare birthday treat meh sabse zyaada baat hui thi humhari and kafi accha laga tha mujhe uss din. You are amazing in a unique way. I wish you all the happiness and Take care Pooja :)
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Pragya,
The music room is all your effort, and we also had plans for Anime streaming at GH TV room XD. I'll remember you by this ðŸ––.
Cheers!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Pratigya, 
Somehow humne galaxy manage kari; not the best one but it was fun :)
Dance drama was the best!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Chinese don, pinky puchki and what not,
Bro, I miss you already. I don't remember how we first met, but I guess this Navodaya thing was common, and we started talking. Thank you guys for introducing me to K-world; I have got so many new crush XD. I love that we could take time to watch " The bold type" and gossip a lot about the relatable stuff. I would never forget your subtle badass expressions and teasing eyes ( even in the airport XD). But I definitely missed you, me and Manisha hanging out together and chit-chatting about literally everything. Thanks for the slightest but unforgettable memories and constantly motivating me to have lunch and dinner.  ( Next birthday ke liye saunf hi gift milega :p). Don't forget to reach out to your personal skin care assistant whenever you want. Hope to meet you soon! and love you a lot puchki.
       Please behen ki shaadi lockdown meh mat hone dena, I badly want to visit Assam LOL. Yaar, yeh Manisha ne kuch zyaada hi likdiya lagraha heh but see most of it is about K-Pop, bas words zyaada use kiye heh usne, toh mera memoir compare mat karna usse :p
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Nach-Nandini,
  Yaar, thank you so much for waking me up for classes every time, even if you didn't attend the class XD. jaldi utke bhi iconic late entry duo hum hi heh I guess. I dont know when we became this close but it was like accha, CHE meh bas iske saat vibe match karega :p. Ab toh professors ko bhi pata chalgaya heh ki yeh dono saatme hi dikhenge ya satme hi project ya course lete heh.  Thanks for making my IITK stay so much memorable from amazing treats, sitting together in the class, daydreaming or dozing in the class, having weird conversations, teasing each other in library or NCL, helping in coursework and assignments and what not! I don't think I have any memory associated with CHE without you. Even the pandemic couldn't keep us away :p; we had a good number of video calls and texts.
   How can I not mention that chit that we dropped to your neighbour - this is one of the fun things I have done at IITK :p. I wish hum ek do baar aur treats and voh aarti wale birthday celebrate karte. Thanks to you and Onbin for making me find happiness and fun in the slightest thing like those strange Bhojpuri songs and twisted words. (Yonsh, gold, silver, bronze brozz, onbin, themks, smoll and funny stickers). Random photos that we three clicked in your room aren't just photos, but they have lots of emotions now. I hope we get to meet soon, and yes! Our old photos give me third wheeling feels aaj kal :p. You hold a very special place in my journey, and of course, we will keep in touch. Thank you so much for everything.
author: Yashika

text: Love you so so much!!!!!!!! ( This love is prominent than romantic ones XD)
author: Yashika

text:
Hi CR, 
kafi mast kaam kiyatha tumne, abhi bacche bhi follow karrahe dakshana ka CR work. Dakshana treats /meetings vagera meh hi mile the but kafi maze kiye unme. Hopefully kabhi dakshana reunion meh mil paye. Until then take care!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Ritesh,
( finally, I know it's Ritesh and not Rithesh :p)
Acads team was one of the amazing team I have worked with; I really enjoyed working with you. We all had a Unique task -  MoM, mails XD (  jisme humhe zyaada daant padhi bhi thi; now that I see, every acads team is continuing this mail error wala legacy ). Tum kafi chaapu insaan ho and yet so down to earth, tumhare achievements ke stories Dipuk batata rehta heh. Aise hi Chaapte raho, all the very best and hopefully we will meet soon until then take care <3.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Rohan!
You are awesome!!!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Swadha,
I remember you introducing me to your mom near the elevator, and it was around the lines like - she is miss freshers, she dances really well. Thanks for giving me a minor celebrity feeling that day XD. You were and will always remain on my good friends' list with those genuine hi hellos and a smile. 
I wish you all the best and Take care <3.
author: Yashika

text:
Yo Tan tan!

Third year Antaragni was the first Antaragni jisme I was roaming around freely ( first year I was sick, second-year dance) I am glad it was with you guys. We could bond at least to some extent there.  I wish ki humhara coordie tenure campus meh hota, aur maze karte. Bohot si cheeze toh maine card meh hi lik diya tha, but yes, you are one of the very sensible and calm people I have ever known. Coordie tenure was fruitful even if it was online, and I was so sure that there will be these 5 others who are always ready to take up work if I'm not able to do it or to keep a check on me <3. 

Chalo baki batien hum apne whatsapp and insta group pe karenge XD.
Yes! bengaluru walonko toh milhi lenge, until then take care!

Always hiDAYATEin <3
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Utsav Akarshan/ Festival attraction ?
            
           Thanks for being such a fantastic person. I can't imagine how I would have survived CHE without you guys. I'll cherish every moment with you, may it be a weird birthday song, long emotional conversations, introspection on what we have become, what could be done better, scolding you for some stuff ;p, treats, funny photos, encouraging each other to do well, exam/ assignments, hectic labs...uff and what not!

I know there is a lot hidden behind this happy face of yours, and it was my pleasure knowing you so personally. You are emotionally and mentally very strong, but don't forget I'll always be there for you when you need something.

 Miss you and Take care. I hope we will meet soon. Until then, adios!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Vineet,
I don't remember the Robo club event, but we used to discuss CHM101 lab work. Even though it was few hi hellos, I found you to be a very cheerful person. I wish we could have had more conversations. Anyway, I hope kabhi ageh milenge. All the best and take care <3.
author: Yashika

text:
Hi Yasharth,
I still remember you humming different songs during our orientation. Most of the times, it was 'Bulleya' from aae dil heh muskil. It was a saviour during boring sessions at Audi, and I used to keep guessing the songs XD.
I wish you all the best; take care!
author: Yashika

text:
Hi!
I know ki maine har group meh zyaada kaam kiya heh XD But you people were good groupmates, and of course, lab courses wouldn't be that fun without you :p.
author: Yashika
